scene_description_enriched: A decorative border of a manuscript page features a vibrant blue flower at the top, followed by a small bird perched on a branch, and an orange butterfly at the bottom. The background is a shimmering gold, suggesting a divine or precious setting. The elements are rendered with detailed brushstrokes, highlighting the textures of the petals, feathers, and wings. This naturalistic depiction within a devotional context likely serves as an ornamental element, possibly symbolizing aspects of creation or the transient beauty of life.
